Name: Ho May Park Ticket with Tramcar and Cable Car Ride
Description:
With this ticket, you'll visit Ho May Park, a popular tourist destination in Vung Tau, offering adventurous activities and sightseeing opportunities. The park is situated on the summit of Nui Long that you'll reach with a cable car ride.
Once there, you can enjoy all the attractions in the park, such as the zoo, pagodas, water park, 5D movie houses, as well as some sightseeing. Given its location atop a mountain, the park offers scenic views of its surrounding landscapes. You can also take a free ride in a tramcar from Station 2 to the central area of the park.
Additional Info:
Please bring your ticket with you to the attraction.
Be aware that operators may cancel for unforeseen reasons.
You need to be 18 years or older to book.
Operated by KLOOK
Location: Ho May Park Ticket , 1a Trần Phú, Phường 1, Thành phố Vũng Tầu, Bà Rịa, Vung Tau City, 790000
Departure Point: Ho May Park Ticket , 1a Trần Phú, Phường 1, Thành phố Vũng Tầu, Bà Rịa, Vung Tau City, 790000

Description: Private City Tour Vung Tau From Phu My Port. Enjoy this full-day excursion through Southern Vietnam's magnificent countryside, visit the city of Vung Tau to view the big Buddha sculpture, admire the iconic Light House or the giant Jesus Statue, and swim at one of Vung Tau's excellent beaches. When your cruise ship arrives at Phu My port, enjoy a private shore excursion to Vung Tau.

Name: Cu Chi Tunnels Shore Excursion from Phu My Port
Description:
Cu Chi Tunnels Shore Excursion is a great journey for passengers to explore Cu Chi Tunnels, Vietnam Countryside; understand more about Vietnam War as well as enjoy various delicious food. We guarantee a local perspective that will give you and your family a once in a lifetime experience.
ITINERARY:
07:30 Pick up at Phu My Port and transfer to visit Cu Chi Tunnels
10:30 Visit Cu Chi tunnels where you will have an opportunity to experience the underground life of guerilla fighters during the past war. The crawl through 50–100 meters of the tunnel system is unforgettable. You will be amazed at the tunnels with their underground story including trap-door, living areas, storage, weapon factories, field hospitals, kitchen, command centre, etc. Local rice paper workshops and nice paddy fields are pleasant sights on the way.
13:00 Have lunch at a local restaurant
14:00 Transfer back to the port
17:00 Drop you off at the port and finish your shore excursions to Cu Chi Tunnels
What's Included:
Lunch at a local restaurant
Entrance ticktets at all sites
Cold water & wet tissues
English speaking guide
Air-conditioned transport
Additional Info:
Wheelchair accessible
Specialized infant seats are available
Travelers should have at least a moderate level of physical fitness
Please bring your ticket with you to the attraction.
Be aware that operators may cancel for unforeseen reasons.
You need to be 18 years or older to book.
Operated by Vietnam Shore Excursions
Location: Phu My Port, Đường số 3, Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu
Departure Point: Phu My Port, Đường số 3, Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu

Name: Long Tan - Nui Dat Battlefield Private Tour From Phu My Port
Description:
TOUR PROGRAM :
Our Guide will greet you at Entrance Gate of Phu My Port with Your Name on Board ( Please let us Know Your ship Schedule to arrange Well ).Then, Transfer to Long Tan Commune in Dat Do District,Ba Ria – Vung Tau Province
We will take you to visit the following places:
- Long Phuoc Underground Tunnel - a former wartime tunnel complex.
- Nui Dat Base (SAS hill)- the former Australian Task Force Base (ATF) at Nui Dat - former military landmarks such as, SAS hill,” Luscombe Field “ air strip, Luscombe Bowl and the “Kangaroo South Pad” a Helicopter dust off strip and the area of Pearly gates. Then visit the Nui Dat Kindy.
- Visit Long Tan Cross Memorial with the brief Long Tan battle.108 members of ANZAC (Australian and New Zealand Army Corp) fighting between 1,500 and 2,500 Viet Cong forces
- Take a look at Horseshoe Hill (Former Fire support Base,named Gia Quy).
Lunch at local Restaurant.
Finish Your Trip & Send you Back to your ship on Time ( one Hour Before Departure )
What's Included:
Entrance Tikcets
Bottled water
English Speaking Tourguide
Private Car or Minivan with safe Driver
Lunch at Local Restaurant
Additional Info:
Specialized infant seats are available
Infants and small children can ride in a pram or stroller
Suitable for all physical fitness levels
Pick up & Drop off Entrance Gate of Phu My Port
Not wheelchair accessible
Please bring your ticket with you to the attraction.
Be aware that operators may cancel for unforeseen reasons.
You need to be 18 years or older to book or be accompanied by an adult.
Operated by Da Nang Hoi An Private Tours & Shore Excursion

Name: Explore the Fascinating Mekong - Private Ho Chi Minh Shore Excursions
Description:
This one-day Ho Chi Minh Shore Excursions from cruise port will give you an insight into the daily life of local people in the Mekong Delta. We suggest you visiting My Tho, the nearest destination in the Mekong River, rather than Vinh Long. If your cruise dock for the whole day, you can also arrange it from Phu My Port in Vung Tau.
⭐ HIGHLIGHTS
- Pick-up & Drop off From Nha Rong, Hiep Phuoc, Phu Huu, Phu My Port
- Boat trip in Mekong Delta, visit local homes and orchards, a coconut candy workshop, a honeybee farm, a sampan ride on palm-shaded creeks, performance of traditional Southern singing;
- Enjoy lunch at local restaurant with Vietnamese traditional food – specialties like elephant fish
- Visit Vinh Trang Pagoda –with beautiful Buddha statues, if time permits!
⭐Duration: 8 hours or longer depending on your time constraints. We always make sure that you return on-time to board the cruise ship.
What's Included:
Lunch as indicated in the itinerary
Please note we can cater for any dietary requirements, just be sure to get in touch beforehand
All entrance fees, boat trips, fruits, honey tea, coconut water, coconut candy
Unlimited Bottles of Water

Name: Explore the Insider of Ho Chi Minh on the back of Motorbike - Shore Excursions
Description:
Are you looking for an adventurous motorbike tour around the hustle and bustle of Ho Chi Minh City? Do you want to experience this vibrant city like a true local? Offered by the Cruise and other booking office, our one-day Ho Chi Minh day tour from all ports is an exciting, authentic and efficient way to explore this city at its best.
⭐ HIGHLIGHTS:
- Experience riding on motorbike, visit Notre-Dame Cathedral & Post Office, Venerable Thich Quang Duc Monument, Old apartment, Flower market, Chinatown with hidden places, Thien Hau Pagoda, photo stops around the city;
- Enjoy lunch with Vietnamese traditional food as Vietnamese pancake & rice noodles with grilled pork/fried roll, Banh Mi, Crab & Shrimp noodle soup – specialty food of the city
- Visit an over 80-year-old cafe hidden in an alley & interact with the nice host & learn how to brew the unique Vot coffee
⭐ Duration: 8 hours or flexible. We always make sure that you return on-time to board the cruise ship.
What's Included:
All food & drinks as indicated in the itinerary
All entrance fees

When your cruise ship pulls into Phu My port, take a private shore excursion to the city of Vung Tau. A private guide drives you through the lovely landscape of southern Vietnam for a look at notable landmarks in this former trading port. Your full-day itinerary covers the 19th-century Villa Blanche (White Villa), the Whale Temple, an impressive Buddha statue and a local fishing village.

Name: Shore Excursion: Long Tan Cross, Long Phuoc Tunnels and Vung Tau City Tour
Description:
The Long Tan Cross is a memorial which was erected by the 6th Battalion, Royal Australian Regiment on 18 August 1969 to mark the site of the Battle of Long Tan, which was fought three years earlier during the Vietnam War.
Long Phuoc tunnel is the mark of the glorious revolutionary tradition and the pride of the future generations. It is also a place to show the ingenious and creative way of people’s war.
Enjoy a sightseeing tour of the coastal city of Vung Tau and explore Vietnamese country life and culture. See the Nirvana Meditation Retreat and important local pagodas. Stop at the giant Jesus statue, taste local cuisine, and visit a nearby village.

Name: Mekong Delta Tour from Phu My Port
Description:
Mekong Delta Tour from Phu My is designed for all valued cruise ship passengers to explore all the hidden charms and beauties of Mekong Delta Vietnam in 1 day. We guarantee a local perspective that will give you and your family a once in a lifetime experience.
ITINERARY:
07:30 Pick you up at Phu My port and transfer to My Tho city
10:30 Take a boat ride along the river to visit local house, fruit plantations and fishing villages
11:30 Enjoy a boat ride through natural canal in Ben Tre, cruising on a hand-rowed sampan under the shadow of the water coconut trees along natural canals, enjoy seasonal fruit& honey tea and “Southern Vietnamese folk music”, performed by the islanders.
12:30 Have lunch in the orchard garden
13:30 Visit a family business which epitomizes the idyllic rural lifestyle, taste the delicious coconut candy and observe the pastoral life.
14:00 Transfer back to the Phu My port
17:00 Drop you off at Phu My port and finish your shore excursions to Mekong Delta.
